s3games.player

Class MiniMaxStochasticPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.player.Player
      • s3games.player.MiniMaxPlayer
        • s3games.player.MiniMaxStochasticPlayer

  • public class MiniMaxStochasticPlayer
extends MiniMaxPlayer
    Extension of the standard minimax player that considers only some of the moves in each game state hoping to search more in depth
